abstract: United States Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta faces big challenges in trying to balance major military cuts against a shifting spectrum of national security threats; decisions Panetta makes could determine whether the American military can still fight two land wars simultaneously, confront new types of high-tech warfare and fulfill promises to those who risked lives for their country (Series: The Next War).
snippet: Leon E. Panetta, the new defense secretary, must balance military cuts against a national security threats.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: Leon E. Panetta, the new defense secretary, must balance military cuts against a national security threats.

headline.main: Panetta’s Pentagon, Without the Blank Check
headline.seo: At Pentagon, Leon E. Panetta Charts Change of Course
headline.print_headline: Panetta’s Pentagon, Without the Blank Check
